problem_statement: Implement a deterministic, configurable order-processing pipeline that validates, filters, sorts, enriches, paginates, and reports metrics for a collection of items while guaranteeing immutability, correctness, and predictable behavior under concurrency, randomness, and cancellation.
FAIL_TO_PASS: tests/test_before.ts::before/after repository test run runs the correct repo test script
tests/test_after.ts::before/after repository test run runs the correct repo test script
tests/test_structure.ts::repository layout sanity checks finds expected .test.ts files in the right places
tests/test_meta.ts::meta-testing: requirement traceability + test integrity (TypeScript) no obvious integrity anti-patterns (console output, focused/skipped tests)
tests/test_meta.ts::meta-testing: requirement traceability + test integrity (TypeScript) requirement traceability signals are present in the generated test suite
